name: Levin
description: Levinswap - built by the LightningDAO - aims to allow crypto users the ability to trade securities tokens using decentralized dapps. Its token - LEVIN - is first and foremost a governance token. Other utilities include - staking to earn portion of fees generated by the exchange. Broader goal of the LightningDAO project is to build a cross-L2-chain DeFi ecosystem, combining liquidity on multiple L2 solutions, along with Ethereum mainnet into one DEX utilizing bridges seamlessly between the chains.
